keystore.desc1: View all the giveaways you have won across the BeepBot Network. You'll be able to see all your keys and links to redeem your wins.
keystore.desc2: This is where keys you have won in BeepBot giveaways are stored.
keystore.desc3: Not seeing any won keys? Check that your have linked any missing accounts in the profile page.

currency.desc1: View your currencies you have earned in channels. You'll also be able to claim the daily claims and play games. (Comming Soon)
